cards.description: Maximize advertising return on investment by identifying your best-performing creatives. Make data-driven decisions to scale winners and cut losers quickly.

cards.title: Multi-Account Management
cards.description: Manage multiple Facebook ad accounts from a single dashboard. Perfect for agencies and businesses managing campaigns across different brands.

cards.title: Custom Metrics and Filters
cards.description: Filter by date ranges, campaigns, ad sets, and custom metrics. Export data for deep analysis and stakeholder reports.

cards.title: Fast and Reliable
